member.name: T:Boxfusion.Health.His.MpDoh.Appointments.AppointmentsChangingEventHandler
member.summary: Intercepts a new appointment before saving to generate and assign a reference number based on the customer's Reference numbering conventions.

member.name: M:Boxfusion.Health.His.MpDoh.Appointments.AppointmentsChangingEventHandler.HandleEvent(Abp.Events.Bus.Entities.EntityChangingEventData{Boxfusion.Health.Cdm.Appointments.CdmAppointment})
member.summary: Adds a newly generated reference number to a new appointment.
